Space

Mercury
    Mercury in Space via Google
  • Distance from Sun: 35.98 million mi
  • Orbital period: 88 days
  • Mass: 3.285 × 10^23 kg (0.055 M⊕)
  • Surface area: 28.88 million mi²
  • Length of day: 58d 15h 30m
Nasa.gov Page On Mercury Source
Venus
    Venus in Space via Google
  • Distance from Sun: 67.24 million mi
  • Orbital period: 225 days
  • Length of day: 116d 18h 0m
  • Surface area: 177.7 million mi²
  • Equatorial rotation velocity: 6.52 km/h (1.81 m/s)
Nasa.gov Page On Venus Source
Earth
    Earth in Space via Google
  • Age is 4.543 billion years as of 2019
  • Distance from the Sun is 92.96 million mi
  • Radius is 3,958.8 mi
  • Population is 7.53 billion (2017) World Bank
  • Earth is wider around the equator
Nasa.gov Page On Earth Source
Mars
    Mars in Space via Google
  • Distance from Sun: 141.6 million mi
  • Orbital period: 687 days
  • Length of day: 1d 0h 37m
  • Surface pressure: 0.636 (0.4–0.87) kPa; 0.00628 atm
Nasa.gov Page On Mars Source

    Jupiter in Space via Google

  • Radius: 43,441 mi
  • Surface area: 23.71 billion mi²
